question: Which Indian was recently appointed as the new Chairman (Global Board of Directors) of the US-India Business Council?
explanation:
The US-India Business Council has appointed Vijay Advani as new Chairman of its Global Board of Directors. Prior to this role as Executive Chairman, Vijay Advani served as the CEO of Investment management company, Nuveen. He had also served as the Co-President of Franklin Templeton Investments.
US India Business Council (USIBC) is the representative body of top global companies operating across the United States and India.
